metadata.synopsis: A dialogue with one of the "guards" in House of Hope. These are Eternal Debtors, each one has a story how did they manage to get into Raphael's hands. ImpDebtors behave a bit differently: they observe everyone and will watch at players constantly.These characters see players as "guests" of House of Hope and they don't know anything about players.
